author: Special Correspondent
text:
Students of the Indian Institute of Technology-Madras are divided on the issue of extending support to the ongoing students’ protests in Jawaharlal Nehru University, New Delhi that have been rocking the country for the past many days.

While a group of students tried to stage a demonstration on Monday, another group said they had reported this incident to the Dean of Students S. Sivakumar.

A Ph.D student said that the students had informed the authorities about the incident both through e-mails and in person.

“We are students and would like to complete our studies,” another student said.
title: JNU issue: IIT–M students put forth differing views
